summary: Three teens discover that their neighbor's house is really a living, breathing, scary monster.
cast: Ryan Whitney|Steve Buscemi|Mitchel Musso|Catherine O'Hara|Fred Willard|Sam Lerner|Woody Schultz|Ian McConnel|Maggie Gyllenhaal|Jason Lee|Spencer Locke|Kevin James|Nick Cannon|Jon Heder|Kathleen Turner|Erik Walker|Matthew Fahey|Brittany Curran|Marc Musso
title: Monster House
